verses.verse: And, behold, there came <S%H935><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> out of Judah <S%H3063><s%> by the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> unto Bethel <S%H1008><s%>: and Jeroboam <S%H3379><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> by the altar <S%H4196><s%> to burn incense <S%H6999><s%>. burn: or, offer

And he cried <S%H7121><s%> against the altar <S%H4196><s%> in the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, O altar <S%H4196><s%>, altar <S%H4196><s%>, thus saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>; Behold, a child <S%H1121><s%> shall be born <S%H3205><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>, Josiah <S%H2977><s%> by name <S%H8034><s%>; and upon thee shall he offer <S%H2076><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> of the high places <S%H1116><s%> that burn incense <S%H6999><s%> upon thee, and men's <S%H120><s%> bones <S%H6106><s%> shall be burnt <S%H8313><s%> upon thee.

And he gave <S%H5414><s%> a sign <S%H4159><s%> the same day <S%H3117><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, This is the sign <S%H4159><s%> which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath spoken <S%H1696><s%>; Behold, the altar <S%H4196><s%> shall be rent <S%H7167><s%>, and the ashes <S%H1880><s%> that are upon it shall be poured out <S%H8210><s%>.

And it came to pass, when king <S%H4428><s%> Jeroboam <S%H3379><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> the saying <S%H1697><s%> of the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, which had cried <S%H7121><s%> against the altar <S%H4196><s%> in Bethel <S%H1008><s%>, that he put forth <S%H7971><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> from the altar <S%H4196><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Lay hold <S%H8610><s%> on him. And his hand <S%H3027><s%>, which he put forth <S%H7971><s%> against him, dried up <S%H3001><s%>, so that he could <S%H3201><s%> not pull it in again <S%H7725><s%> to him.

The altar <S%H4196><s%> also was rent <S%H7167><s%>, and the ashes <S%H1880><s%> poured out <S%H8210><s%> from the altar <S%H4196><s%>, according to the sign <S%H4159><s%> which the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> had given <S%H5414><s%> by the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

And the king <S%H4428><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, Intreat <S%H2470><s%> now the face <S%H6440><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, and pray <S%H6419><s%> for me, that my hand <S%H3027><s%> may be restored me again <S%H7725><s%>. And the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> besought <S%H2470><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and the king's <S%H4428><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> was restored him again <S%H7725><s%>, and became as it was before <S%H7223><s%>. the LORD, and: Heb. the face of the LORD, etc

And the king <S%H4428><s%> said <S%H1696><s%> unto the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, Come <S%H935><s%> home <S%H1004><s%> with me, and refresh <S%H5582><s%> thyself, and I will give <S%H5414><s%> thee a reward <S%H4991><s%>.

And the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the king <S%H4428><s%>, If thou wilt give <S%H5414><s%> me half <S%H2677><s%> thine house <S%H1004><s%>, I will not go in <S%H935><s%> with thee, neither will I eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> nor drink <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> in this place <S%H4725><s%>:

For so was it charged <S%H6680><s%> me by the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Eat <S%H398><s%> no bread <S%H3899><s%>, nor drink <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%>, nor turn again <S%H7725><s%> by the same way <S%H1870><s%> that thou camest <S%H1980><s%>.
So he went <S%H3212><s%> another <S%H312><s%> way <S%H1870><s%>, and returned <S%H7725><s%> not by the way <S%H1870><s%> that he came <S%H935><s%> to Bethel <S%H1008><s%>.

Now there dwelt <S%H3427><s%> an <S%H259><s%> old <S%H2205><s%> prophet <S%H5030><s%> in Bethel <S%H1008><s%>; and his sons <S%H1121><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and told <S%H5608><s%> him all the works <S%H4639><s%> that the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> had done <S%H6213><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%> in Bethel <S%H1008><s%>: the words <S%H1697><s%> which he had spoken <S%H1696><s%> unto the king <S%H4428><s%>, them they told <S%H5608><s%> also to their father <S%H1><s%>.

And their father <S%H1><s%> said <S%H1696><s%> unto them, What way <S%H1870><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> he? For his sons <S%H1121><s%> had seen <S%H7200><s%> what <S%H335><s%> way <S%H1870><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> went <S%H1980><s%>, which came <S%H935><s%> from Judah <S%H3063><s%>.
And he said <S%H559><s%> unto his sons <S%H1121><s%>, Saddle <S%H2280><s%> me the ass <S%H2543><s%>. So they saddled <S%H2280><s%> him the ass <S%H2543><s%>: and he rode <S%H7392><s%> thereon,

And went <S%H3212><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, and found <S%H4672><s%> him sitting <S%H3427><s%> under an oak <S%H424><s%>: and he said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Art thou the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> that camest <S%H935><s%> from Judah <S%H3063><s%>? And he said <S%H559><s%>, I am.
Then he said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Come <S%H3212><s%> home <S%H1004><s%> with me, and eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%>, I may <S%H3201><s%> not return <S%H7725><s%> with thee, nor go in <S%H935><s%> with thee: neither will I eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> nor drink <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> with thee in this place <S%H4725><s%>:

For it was said <S%H1697><s%> to me by the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, Thou shalt eat <S%H398><s%> no bread <S%H3899><s%> nor drink <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> there, nor turn again <S%H7725><s%> to go <S%H3212><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> that thou camest <S%H1980><s%>. it: Heb. a word was

He said <S%H559><s%> unto him, I am a prophet <S%H5030><s%> also as thou art; and an angel <S%H4397><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto me by the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Bring him back <S%H7725><s%> with thee into thine house <S%H1004><s%>, that he may eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%>. But he lied <S%H3584><s%> unto him.
So he went back <S%H7725><s%> with him, and did eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> in his house <S%H1004><s%>, and drank <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%>.

And it came to pass, as they sat <S%H3427><s%> at the table <S%H7979><s%>, that the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came unto the prophet <S%H5030><s%> that brought him back <S%H7725><s%>:

And he cried <S%H7121><s%> unto the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> that came <S%H935><s%> from Judah <S%H3063><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, Forasmuch as <S%H3282><s%> thou hast disobeyed <S%H4784><s%> the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and hast not kept <S%H8104><s%> the commandment <S%H4687><s%> which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> thee,

But camest back <S%H7725><s%>, and hast eaten <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> and drunk <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%>, of the which the LORD did say <S%H1696><s%> to thee, Eat <S%H398><s%> no bread <S%H3899><s%>, and drink <S%H8354><s%> no water <S%H4325><s%>; thy carcase <S%H5038><s%> shall not come <S%H935><s%> unto the sepulchre <S%H6913><s%> of thy fathers <S%H1><s%>.

And it came to pass, after <S%H310><s%> he had eaten <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%>, and after <S%H310><s%> he had drunk <S%H8354><s%>, that he saddled <S%H2280><s%> for him the ass <S%H2543><s%>, to wit, for the prophet <S%H5030><s%> whom he had brought back <S%H7725><s%>.

And when he was gone <S%H3212><s%>, a lion <S%H738><s%> met <S%H4672><s%> him by the way <S%H1870><s%>, and slew <S%H4191><s%> him: and his carcase <S%H5038><s%> was cast <S%H7993><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%>, and the ass <S%H2543><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> by <S%H681><s%> it, the lion <S%H738><s%> also stood <S%H5975><s%> by the carcase <S%H5038><s%>.

And, behold, men <S%H582><s%> passed by <S%H5674><s%>, and saw <S%H7200><s%> the carcase <S%H5038><s%> cast <S%H7993><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%>, and the lion <S%H738><s%> standing <S%H5975><s%> by <S%H681><s%> the carcase <S%H5038><s%>: and they came <S%H935><s%> and told <S%H1696><s%> it in the city <S%H5892><s%> where the old <S%H2205><s%> prophet <S%H5030><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%>.

And when the prophet <S%H5030><s%> that brought him back <S%H7725><s%> from the way <S%H1870><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> thereof, he said <S%H559><s%>, It is the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, who was disobedient <S%H4784><s%> unto the word <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>: therefore the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath delivered <S%H5414><s%> him unto the lion <S%H738><s%>, which hath torn <S%H7665><s%> him, and slain <S%H4191><s%> him, according to the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, which he spake <S%H1696><s%> unto him. torn: Heb. broken
And he spake <S%H1696><s%> to his sons <S%H1121><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Saddle <S%H2280><s%> me the ass <S%H2543><s%>. And they saddled <S%H2280><s%> him.

And he went <S%H3212><s%> and found <S%H4672><s%> his carcase <S%H5038><s%> cast <S%H7993><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%>, and the ass <S%H2543><s%> and the lion <S%H738><s%> standing <S%H5975><s%> by <S%H681><s%> the carcase <S%H5038><s%>: the lion <S%H738><s%> had not eaten <S%H398><s%> the carcase <S%H5038><s%>, nor torn <S%H7665><s%> the ass <S%H2543><s%>. torn: Heb. broken

And the prophet <S%H5030><s%> took up <S%H5375><s%> the carcase <S%H5038><s%> of the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, and laid <S%H3240><s%> it upon the ass <S%H2543><s%>, and brought it back <S%H7725><s%>: and the old <S%H2205><s%> prophet <S%H5030><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to the city <S%H5892><s%>, to mourn <S%H5594><s%> and to bury <S%H6912><s%> him.
And he laid <S%H3240><s%> his carcase <S%H5038><s%> in his own grave <S%H6913><s%>; and they mourned <S%H5594><s%> over him, saying, Alas <S%H1945><s%>, my brother <S%H251><s%>!

And it came to pass, after <S%H310><s%> he had buried <S%H6912><s%> him, that he spake <S%H559><s%> to his sons <S%H1121><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, When I am dead <S%H4191><s%>, then bury <S%H6912><s%> me in the sepulchre <S%H6913><s%> wherein the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> is buried <S%H6912><s%>; lay <S%H3240><s%> my bones <S%H6106><s%> beside <S%H681><s%> his bones <S%H6106><s%>:

For the saying <S%H1697><s%> which he cried <S%H7121><s%> by the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> against the altar <S%H4196><s%> in Bethel <S%H1008><s%>, and against all the houses <S%H1004><s%> of the high places <S%H1116><s%> which are in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Samaria <S%H8111><s%>, shall surely come to pass.

After <S%H310><s%> this thing <S%H1697><s%> Jeroboam <S%H3379><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> not from his evil <S%H7451><s%> way <S%H1870><s%>, but made <S%H6213><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> of the lowest <S%H7098><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> priests <S%H3548><s%> of the high places <S%H1116><s%>: whosoever would <S%H2655><s%>, he consecrated <S%H4390><s%> <S%H3027><s%> him, and he became one of the priests <S%H3548><s%> of the high places <S%H1116><s%>. made: Heb. returned and made consecrated: Heb. filled his hand

And this thing <S%H1697><s%> became sin <S%H2403><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jeroboam <S%H3379><s%>, even to cut it off <S%H3582><s%>, and to destroy <S%H8045><s%> it from off the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth <S%H127><s%>.
